MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD11 postcode area of Duns, affecting properties in Langtongate and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.47am. Our engineers have arrived the local area and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.58am on Thursday 4th February 2021
